name: ONIS
description:
Join with friends and battle with iconic Portuguese characters.

Onis is a game under development for PC PS5 and Switch.

It is a strategy-turn-based game with local multiplayer features.

In Onis, you will enter into a cubic world with the goal of steal the opponent's crown and return to your kingdom.

Onis's main feature is to reposition tiles to make your paths.

Trying to be faster than the opponent can be a good strategy, but you will also need to defend your base. With the help of power-ups, you can hamper the opponent or get the upper hand. If you are up for it you can also drown your opponent, make him return to his base.

Design by Tomás Longo

Art by Joana Marques

Code by Luís Chaves
